summary.title: Summary
summary.subtitle: Trust infrastructure to transform field activity into verifiable digital assets.
summary.description: Our protocol operates through a three-step validation cycle that guarantees data integrity from capture in disconnected zones to certification on the blockchain.

step_a.title: Offline-First Registration
step_a.description: The technician uses the Field App in the field to generate proof of life and action:
list: Identity: Biometric and documentary registration to create Digital Identities (DID).
Evidence: Capture of geolocated photos, fingerprints, and audio reports that are packaged and encrypted locally on the device.

step_b.title: Immutable Synchronization
step_b.description: Upon regaining connectivity, the application synchronizes data packages:
list: IPFS (Storage): Evidence files are distributed across a decentralized network, making them uncensorable.
Polkadot (Consensus): The cryptographic hash of the operation is recorded, creating an unalterable timestamp.

step_c.title: Private Validation
list: Confidential Computing (Phala Network): We process sensitive data in a secure environment (TEE) to validate consistency between identity and evidence without exposing the beneficiary's privacy.
Result: Issuance of a Digital Certificate that releases funds and updates the funder's dashboard.

management.title: Management
management.subtitle: A financial model designed to maximize impact: the greater the management volume, the lower the service cost.
management.description: In the current phase (Pre-Seed), the protocol's fixed cost structure represents a higher percentage due to intensive development. However, our B2I (Business to Institutions) model is deflationary for the client: by adding more NGOs to the network, the management fund grows and the percentage cost of the service is drastically reduced.

proyeccion.title: Projection Dashboard
proyeccion.subtitle: R&D+i (DAO) Financing Model and Scale Efficiency.
proyeccion.globalDescription: Total Ecosystem Cost (KEY + DAO) over Managed Capital.

phases.description: The 15% covers the initial technical, legal, and operational structure to validate the model.
By doubling the network, the service cost drops almost in half, transferring that savings directly to the funders' impact budget.
With the ecosystem consolidated, operational efficiency allows reducing the cost to less than 5%, maximizing the resources that effectively reach the communities.

about_page.title: Team
about_page.description: We combine direct experience in the social sector with specialized Web3 software engineering to build scalable impact infrastructure.

martin.bio: Responsible for strategic direction and business development. Defines the B2B/B2I model architecture and manages institutional alliances, providing the operational know-how necessary for implementation in low-connectivity territories.

andres.bio: In charge of decentralized infrastructure. Designs and develops smart contracts and security protocols, guaranteeing the integrity and immutability of audit records.

mateo.bio: Leads system engineering and backend development. Specialist in offline-first synchronization logic, biometric identity integration, and decentralized storage (IPFS), ensuring the platform's technical operability.

kevin.bio: Directs design and frontend development. Responsible for user interface (Web and Mobile) and customer experience, translating complex technical requirements into intuitive management tools for field operators and investors.

hero.title: Services
hero.description: Our technology is modular. We offer specific solutions to solve critical management, identity, and validation problems.

services.title: Decentralized Digital Identity (DID)
services.subtitle: The digital passport for development.
services.description: Create and manage sovereign identities for beneficiaries in areas without connectivity.
services.functionality: Offline biometric and documentary registration that generates a verifiable confidential credential on the blockchain.
services.advantage: The ability to link acquired skills to individuals enables the implementation of impact projects based on verified and confidential data.

services.title: Encrypted Evidence Validator
services.subtitle: Action certification with guaranteed privacy.
services.description: A verification engine that processes field evidence without exposing sensitive data.
services.functionality: Automatic analysis of photos, audios, and coordinates using Artificial Intelligence in a secure environment (TEE).
services.advantage: Audits task compliance (e.g., course attendance) while protecting participants' identity.
services.idealFor: CSR Auditing, Carbon Credits, Origin Certification.

services.title: Investment Monitor (Dashboard B2I)
services.subtitle: Real-time financial traceability.
services.description: The definitive control panel to visualize fund flow and its impact.
services.functionality: Visualization of key metrics, fund release by completed milestones, and certified impact reports.
services.advantage: Eliminates deferred visibility of investments, offering total transparency on where and how funds are invested.
services.idealFor: Development Banks, Impact Investment Funds, Corporate Philanthropy.

services.title: Report Automation
services.subtitle: Goodbye to manual management.
services.description: Transform messy field data into standardized reports instantly.
services.functionality: AI agents that structure information collected by the Field App into ready-to-present formats (PDF, Excel, API).
services.advantage: Reduces administrative time for technical teams by 90%, allowing them to focus on social work.
services.idealFor: Project Coordinators, Monitoring and Evaluation Teams.

allies_section.title: Allies
allies_section.description: Powered by leaders in technology, education, and social impact.

birthday_modal.title: Happy Birthday {name}!
birthday_modal.message: Today we celebrate the life of one of our founders. Thank you for your vision and leadership!

description.part2: provides the digital infrastructure to certify actions in connectivity-free environments, transforming field management into immutable evidence. We enable organizations to validate their work with

auditability.title: Native & Immutable Auditability
auditability.description: Every data point is traceable on-chain from origin to dashboard, enabling programmatic audits in real time without human intervention.

impact.title: Certified Impact
impact.description: We verify cryptographic proofs of occurred impact, using Trusted Execution Environments to compute sensitive data without exposing personal information.

investment.title: Programmable Investment
investment.description: Smart contracts that release funds based on verified milestones. We reduce administrative and reporting costs while maximizing capital.

impacto.title: Impact
impacto.subtitle: Verifiable infrastructure for the regenerative economy.

refi.title: Infrastructure for the Impact Economy (ReFi)
refi.description: We are a DePIN network that connects global capital with verifiable offline data. We provide cryptographic certainty from territories without connectivity, enabling scaling with confidence and transparency.

digitalAsset.title: Turning Impact into a Verifiable Digital Asset
digitalAsset.description: Establishing a protocol for decentralized offline verification, transforming real-world activities into immutable 'on-chain' data, creating a new class of reliable asset for the global economy.

identity.title: Onboarding with Sovereign Identity
identity.description: We implement standards to grant portable and private digital identities to users in offline environments. We transform anonymous participants into verifiable economic actors without relying on central databases.

poi.title: Proof of Impact Generation (PoI)
poi.description: Our protocol uses biometric and geospatial data captured in the field to 'hash' real-world events. These are anchored on the blockchain as immutable cryptographic proofs, ready to be audited by smart contracts.
